CustomField.formula: AND(EBH_FeedbackScore__c >= 1000, EBH_PositiveFeedback__c >= 0.98, !EBH_VeROViolation__c, (ISPICKVAL(EBH_ActualStandard__c, "ETRS") || ISPICKVAL(EBH_ActualStandard__c, "Above Standard")), !CONTAINS("*uk *de *fr *es *it _uk _de _fr _es _it -uk -de -fr -es -it", RIGHT(Name,3)),!CONTAINS("www_ www- www. ", LEFT(Name,4)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please review the Standards section for details. Required: - Actual Standard = "ETRS" or "Above Standard" - Feedback Score >= 1000 - Positive Feedback >= 98% - VeRo Violation = FALSE
CustomField.label: Deal Program Vetted
